dt-button.name: selectAll
dt-button.summary: Select all items in the table based on the current item select mode
dt-button.description: The `selectAll` button will simply select all items in the table, based on the current item selection mode (`s-api select.items()`) - e.g. if the item selection mode is `rows`, all rows in the table will be selected when this button is activated.

defaults.parameter: This can be configured using the `buttons.selectAll` option of the DataTables `dt-init language` object, or using the `b-init buttons.buttons.text` option for this button.
Select all items in the table based on the current item select mode.
